title: Countries with the highest rates of autism among children worldwide as of 2018
yAxis: Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories for the x axis representing Country, and a y axis representing Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied.
The highest category is found at United_States where Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is 168.0.
The lowest category is found at Portugal where Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is 9.2.
gold: In 2018 , it was estimated that around 168 per 10,000 children in the United States had autism spectrum disorder , one of the highest prevalence rates in the world . Autism spectrum disorder ( ASD ) includes a variety of disorders . The `` spectrum '' denotes the range of symptoms as well as their severity .
